DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study investigate effect transdermal patch parameter hemostasis ( blood clotting ) , lipid ( fat ) , carbohydrate ( sugar ) metabolism healthy woman require contraception .
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman request contraception Normal cervical smear require followup History regular cyclic menstrual period Willingness use nonhormonal contraception two washout cycle start treatment two treatment period Pregnancy lactation Obesity ( Body Mass Index [ BMI ] > 30.0 kg/m2 ) Any disease condition compromise function body system Any disease condition might interfere conduct study interpretation result Any disease condition may worsen hormonal treatment Undiagnosed abnormal genital bleed Any medication could result excessive accumulation , impaired metabolism , alter excretion study drug interfere conduct study interpretation result
